t: G-III buys some assets of Jessica Howard, Industrial Cotton | Reuters
s: May 24, 2007 - May 24 (Reuters) - G-III Apparel Group Ltd. said it bought some assets of Jessica Howard Ltd. and Industrial Cotton Inc. for about $8.1 million. The acquisition will help G-III grow its dresses business by adding new dress licenses and expanding its private label business, Chief Executive Officer Morris Goldfarb said in a statement.
